Class Tag

java.lang.Object
model.Tag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Tag extends Object implements Serializable
The Tag class represents a tag that is part of a Photo. It provides functionality to manage the name and value of the tag. It also provides methods to compare tags and generate a string representation of the tag.

This class implements Serializable to allow serialization of album objects.

Features of the Album class include:

  • Managing instance fields
  • Retrieving a string representation of tag
  • Comparing equality and getting a hashcode
See Also:
